material_print_temp_wait.label: Wait for Nozzle Heatup
material_print_temp_wait.description: Whether to wait until the nozzle temperature is reached at the start.

material_bed_temp_wait.label: Wait for Build Plate Heatup
material_bed_temp_wait.description: Whether to insert a command to wait until the build plate temperature is reached at the start.

material_print_temp_prepend.label: Include Material Temperatures
material_print_temp_prepend.description: Whether to include nozzle temperature commands at the start of the gcode. When the start_gcode already contains nozzle temperature commands Cura frontend will automatically disable this setting.

material_bed_temp_prepend.label: Include Build Plate Temperature
material_bed_temp_prepend.description: Whether to include build plate temperature commands at the start of the gcode. When the start_gcode already contains build plate temperature commands Cura frontend will automatically disable this setting.

machine_start_gcode.label: Start GCode
machine_start_gcode.description: Gcode commands to be executed at the very start - separated by \n.
machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;----- Start Gcode -----
M82 ;absolute extrusion mode
M2000 ;Custom cmd: set to line-mode
M888 P3 ;Custom cmd: current is p3d
G1 Z15.0 F1000 ;Move header up 15mm
G92 E0
G1 F200 E3
G92 E0
;----- Start Gcode -----

machine_end_gcode.label: End GCode
machine_end_gcode.description: Gcode commands to be executed at the very end - separated by \n.
machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;----- End Gcode -----
;Move header up 10mm
G91
G0 Z10
G90
M104 S0
;Retract the filament
G92 E1
G1 E-1 F300
;----- End Gcode -----

support_enable.label: Generate Support
support_enable.description: Generate structures to support parts of the model which have overhangs. Without these structures, such parts would collapse during printing.

support_type.label: Support Placement
support_type.description: Adjusts the placement of the support structures. The placement can be set to touching build plate or everywhere. When set to everywhere the support structures will also be printed on the model.
